definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

pinyin: re4 he2 ju4 bian4 fan3 ying4

sentences.english: A hydrogen bomb has a built-in atomic bomb, which is needed to trigger the fusion reaction.
sentences.chinese: 氢弹内置了一颗原子弹，用于触发聚变反应。

sentences.english: Cold fusion has been investigated by the electrolytical method and the deuterium absorption method.
sentences.chinese: 采用电解法和氘气吸附法研究了冷聚变现象。

sentences.english: A nuclear fusion is a thermonuclear reaction.
sentences.chinese: 核聚变是一种热核反应。

sentences.english: The fissions (or fusions) of these localized coherent structures may occur after their interactions.
sentences.chinese: 这些局域相干结构的相互作用存在裂变和聚变现象。

sentences.english: 2201 – At the Sun slowing thermonuclear processes. Temperature drops.
sentences.chinese: 2201年，太阳热核聚变减慢，地球气温大幅下降。

sentences.english: This should, in turn, cause more fusion reactions until the fuel runs out.
sentences.chinese: 这应当依次导致更多的聚变反应，直到燃料耗尽。

sentences.english: The oscillogram photographs of the neutrons from laser-produced plasma were taken for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次拍摄到我国激光聚变上发射的中子信号波形照片。

sentences.english: The beam sampling grating (BSG) used in the inertial confinement fusion system is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了用于惯性约束核聚变系统的取样光栅。

sentences.english: But there's a snag in its widespread adoption as a fusion fuel.
sentences.chinese: 但是，作为聚变燃料成为它被广泛应用的障碍。

sentences.english: But accelerators could potentially produce nuclear fusion, which fuses atomic nuclei together.
sentences.chinese: 而加速器可能产生核聚变，将原子核融合在一起。

sentences.english: Physicists are looking at the complex fusion of chain reactions.
sentences.chinese: 物理学家转向复合性连锁反应聚变上。

sentences.english: S. fight? " claims the North possesses nuclear fusion technology.
sentences.chinese: 的视频宣称朝鲜拥有核聚变技术。

sentences.english: A 3-D ray equation on optical trajectory of laser propagation in the laser-driven fusion is firstly proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了激光聚变中激光传播的三维光学轨迹光路方程。

sentences.english: The erosion of a divertor target of beryllium in a fusion reactor is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了偏滤器铍靶在聚变堆工况下的腐蚀问题。

sentences.english: Deuterium-based fusion reactors enter widespread use on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 基于重氢的聚变反应堆在地球上被广泛使用。

sentences.english: Every fusion reaction devours exactly one tritium ion and produces exactly one neutron.
sentences.chinese: 每一个聚变反应会耗一个氚核并只产生一个中子。

pinyin: lian4 shi4 lie4 bian4 fan3 ying4
